solution.text:
We see that the Second term = a + d
\(a_2=_{{j+k}}_\)
The third term = a + 2*d
\( a_3=_{{j+(2*k)}}_\)
The 4th term = a + 3*d
\( a_4=_{{j+(3*k)}}_\)

content.text: Calculate the first four terms of the AP, when the first term(a) is _{j}_ and the common difference(d) is _{k}_. From the options given below tick on the 4th term in your calculated list:
